enWisdom: Consultation is [a means of] seeking [assistance and] support
How good a support consultation is!
What a good backing [and support] consultation is!
There is no backing [and support that is stronger and] more reliable than consultation

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ النَّاسِ رَأْياً مَنْ لَا يَسْتَغْنِي عَنْ رَأْيِ مُشِيرٍ
enWisdom: The person with the best opinion is he who does not consider himself needless of the counsel of an advisor

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا حُضَّ عَلَى الْمُشَاوَرَةِ لِأَنَّ رَأْيَ الْمُشِيرِ صِرْفٌ وَرَأْيَ الْمُسْتَشِيرِ مَشُوبٌ بِالْهَوَى
enWisdom: Indeed consultation has only been urged because the opinion of the adviser is unbiased while the opinion of the consulter is mixed with bias
When you have decided [to do something], then consult [with others]

Wisdom: إِذَا أَمْضَيْتَ أَمْراً فَأَمْضِهِ بَعْدَ الرَّوِيَّةِ وَمُرَاجَعَةِ الْمَشُورَةِ وَلَا تُؤَخِّرْ عَمَلَ يَوْمٍ إِلَى غَدٍ وَأَمْضِ لِكُلِّ يَوْمٍ عَمَلَهُ
enWisdom: When you proceed with an affair then proceed after deliberation and seeking advice; do not delay your action of today to tomorrow, and perform each day’s action on that same day

Wisdom: بَاكِرُوا فَالْبَرَكَةُ فِي الْمُبَاكَرَةِ وَشَاوِرُوا فَالنُّجْحُ فِي الْمُشَاوَرَةِ
enWisdom: Wake up early [in the morning] for there is blessing in early rising; and consult each other, for success is in consultation

Wisdom: جِمَاعُ الْخَيْرِ فِي الْمُشَاوَرَةِ وَالْأَخْذِ بِقَوْلِ النَّصِيحِ
enWisdom: The consolidation of good is in seeking advice and acting upon words of the sincere adviser

Wisdom: شَاوِرْ قَبْلَ أَنْ تَعْزِمَ وَفَكِّرْ قَبْلَ أَنْ تُقْدِمَ
enWisdom: Consult before you decide and think before you proceed
You must seek consultation, for indeed it is the result of judiciousness
It is possible for the seeker of right guidance to attain it

Wisdom: مَنْ شَاوَرَ الرِّجَالَ شَارَكَهَا فِي عُقُولِهَا
enWisdom: One who consults with the people shares in their [combined] intellects

Wisdom: لَا تَسْتَصْغِرَنَّ عِنْدَكَ الرَّأْيَ الْخَطِيرَ إِذَا أَتَاكَ بِهِ الرَّجُلُ الْحَقِيرُ
enWisdom: Do not belittle a noteworthy opinion [even] when it is brought to you by an inferior person
The intelligent one never dispenses with consultation
